text: RT @motokorich: Citizens of Okinawa have long complained about noise, crime and aircraft accidents related to American military bases on the island. Now, it’s a large outbreak of coronavirus among soldiers. “I’m scared,” said a noodle shop worker. https://t.co/nxGdXJqiMA

name: nytimes
text: The U.S. budget deficit grew to a record $864 billion for June as the federal government pumped huge sums of money into the economy to prop up workers and businesses affected by the coronavirus, the Treasury Department said https://t.co/AvFWsCibcT

name: nytimes
text: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau of Canada apologized for failing to recuse himself in the awarding of a government contract to a charity with deep connections to his family. It's the 3rd time he has been investigated for breaking conflict-of-interest rules. https://t.co/75Py28T7ic
